author: fcouderc
body:
#### PR description:
Add a protection to avoir extrapolation of laser correction if time > t3 + delta t.
If the time of the event is higher than t3 (time of the "end" of the IOV) plus a safety margin then we force t = t3 + delta t.  Delta t is initialised to zero. This behaviour was enforced by adding spurious IOVs in the database. 

#### PR validation:
Check that delta t was properly propagated from the plugin EcalLaserCorrectionService to EcalLaserServiceDb the EcalLaserService and t_laser is properly set for events with t.< t3 and t > t3 + delta
title: Protection for extrapolation of laser correction
